website_summaries.verdict: A slender, fully-featured TV, and a very competitive price for this technology.
pros: Stunning 140cm screen with intelligent processing to maximise image quality
Remote voice control via LG or Alexa controls (extra)
4 HDMI ports, USB, WiFi and BT (Ethernet)
Low power use: Energy Class A
cons: A small number of owners have experienced ‘burn-in’ (ghost images)

customer_reviews.title: A really Smart TV
customer_reviews.text: I read the comment about this being a really big TV but wife was won over by the quality of picture etc. I bit the bullet and sure enough, after similar comments on the size, wife was won over by it's features and picture quality. This was a great buy and the only down side is that it has made all other TV's in the house redundant. Everyone wants to use this one and I am at the bottom of the list. I'll have to save up for another one for my shed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oled B9 55'
customer_reviews.text: Very good TV, moving from high range LG 47inch LED TV from 2012, can see the difference in technology over the past 7 years, the 55inch is perfect for our size room. Works well with the 4k Streaming Services and Panasonic UB820 4K Player, only thing which is a shame that no 3D option anymore for my Blu rays. Sound wise all OK with the TV Speakers but a decent sound bar would be best. Worth buying this option or the C9 if you have the funds.
customer_reviews.author: Derfal5x5

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture and surprisingly good sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought at the end of November 2019, so we've had this set for a while now. The blacks are beautifully black, the picture is excellent, and the sound from the built-in speakers is surprisingly good. In fact, we often just leave our soundbar (Cambridge Audio TVB2) off the TV obviously has less low end, but other than that it sounds great. It gets pretty mixed use - games, TV, movies, some sport (Formula 1) and all have looked and performed really well. A very nice touch is that it detects when we switch to the Xbox One and turns on auto low-latency mode itself. Very happy, and have a feeling we'll be using this TV for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Kane

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic panel
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier with this TV! It's easily the best picture quality I've seen, bar none. Input lag is almost non-existent, colour reproduction and details are perfect, and OMG the black levels - absolutely perfect (thanks to it being an OLED). The panel itself is incredibly thin, and the design is nice with tiny bezels all 'round. I haven't tested the sound quality as I use it with a receiver. Connectivity is good too, with gigabit Ethernet, WiFi, HDMI 2.1 (which supports eARC!) and many more misc. ports. The brightness in HDR scenes is good, but could be better IMO. That's my only gripe with an otherwise perfect screen.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Smart

customer_reviews.title: Biggest and best TV we have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This tv is a really good, the picture for 4K Ultra HD is spectacle and even standard definition on it is better than I expected. Watching movies is amazing on this tv, blacks are perfect. Sound is also really good, better than my previouse panny tv. You dont really need a seperate sound bar. I really like the magic remote pointer and menu system. I also use this tv for gaming on my PS4, and games are in HDR, it is really bright.
customer_reviews.author: S.S. Bhatti

customer_reviews.title: Excellent all round
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. I worked for an electronics retailer for a number of years but this is miles better than the top of the line product from 4 years ago and not at top of the line prices. I compared the various TVs at different price points from the different manufacturers and thought this really game out ahead. Out of the box the colour settings and motion are way over the top but there are some great guides online that help you calibrate and once you do the thing shines.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Chande

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect to be satisfied with the NOW app. :-(.
customer_reviews.text: A great tv, but one of the reasons I bought it was because it has a NOW app. Unfortunately, that does not work well. Initially I could not sign into it, and a quick google revealed I was not alone. A week later I was finally able to sign in and thought my problems were over. Not. Now I can watch the live SKY channels, but when trying to watch catchup programs or box sets it just goes into mumble mode. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Alistair Paton

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and performs well
customer_reviews.text: Got this TV and I am very happy with the purchase. The picture quality is really good it’s fast and responsive. I use this as my main streaming device, don’t use it for gaming so can’t comment on performance. We also have this connected to a Sonos playbar so can’t really comment on the sound. The screen is really think although it is quite a bit thicker towards the bottom. This helps with wall mounting as my sockets are behind the thin part. Looks good and performs well. My only gripe is that amazon reduced the price within a week of my purchase and didn’t price match.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T. C. Riddick

customer_reviews.title: MUST get a Soundbar
customer_reviews.text: Speakers in this unit are below capacity imho! I’m slightly hard of hearing so I got a Sonos Beam to compensate and with both I’m very impressed!! Picture quality on HD freesat is all I need and on blue ray DVD you would find it hard to better! But get a soundbar!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bellmaine

customer_reviews.title: a very good tv
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing TV, I was concerned with regards to the screen burn nightmares I've read about. But I see no evidence of this on my screen yet. There is a pixel thingy built in anyway, so if you are concerned, run that every few weeks and you will be fine!! 4k has come on leaps and bounds and the fact this TV was just over a grand is unbelievable!! Amazing picture. Even the sound is so impressive I sometimes don't use my surround sound!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality TV ... HUGE. Not hugely light but SO thin which is good but was in fear of touching carrying and Manoeuvring it lest I held the wrong place! But quality of the TV is exceptional and set up was easy. Remote works for all, inc Sky (magic remote) but a little fiddly.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent display, likeable OS.
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality, good selection of apps with decent performance across the board. Strange remote control that emulates a mouse pointer, but you can ignore that and just use buttons. TV supports low latency for gaming and a good HDMI CEC implementation which interestingly, works fully with an xbox one but not a playstation 4. I sense some shenanigans by Sony here.
customer_reviews.author: knuckle

customer_reviews.title: A SIGNIFICANT LEAP FORWARD IN TV TECHNOLOGY.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture quality. Good sound, Smart TV/Internet good. The only questionable aspect was the addition of the latest Sonas Arc Soundbar(not essential). Took ages to set up to integrate with TV, via the Sonas smartphone app. After installation, the soundbar becomes the default TV sound output, which has to be switched on via the Sonas app.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Worth a look
customer_reviews.text: Good quality picture and great smart capabilities. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Cains

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: By far the best tv I’ve owned. Picture is just incredible can’t believe the difference compared to my ultra HD Curve upstairs. Price tag is high but well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly poor
customer_reviews.text: Weird artefacts when using the default settings. Picture can be excellent but only if you’re prepared to spend hours tweaking the settings manually. Had an issue with the TV guide not working. Main PCB was replaced and now, three days later, the problem has returned. There are only so many times you can reset to factory settings and reinstall every app and adjust the settings! I would never buy another LG tv.
customer_reviews.author: G. P. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but needs screws for attachment to a wall bracket.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent TV and easy to set up. Still trying to get to grips with all its features. It comes with screws to attach to the stand that comes with it but no screws if you are attaching it to a wall bracket which is poor. No information on size if screws so I contacted amazon support who tried to help but to no avail. Eventually worked out the you need M6/25mm and the TV is now happily on my wall. Spending £1,700 on a tele I don’t think it’s too much to ask that they supply screws or at least clearly document what ones you need.
customer_reviews.author: Mr A A Whyte

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for bright rooms, very flexible viewing options
customer_reviews.text: (65inch version) This telly is staggering, watchable in daytime (South west aspect room, many windows) and at night or with blackouts the depth is so good. Screen not much thicker than a UK £1 coin. Amazing remote that you point and click at the screen like a touch screen and highly accurate. Has Amazon prime button on remote which pulls up my Prime account, so thinking my firestick is now redundant - Alexa available by pressing remote
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Very good OLED TV
customer_reviews.text: This is a great OLED TV. Picture quality is great (once you've messed with the settings to tune off varous things), smart tv aspects solid. Onbourd sound is average , but fine for a TV. Does have an occasional sound dropping issue that is slightly annoying. Also sound and picture sync with soundbars can be a bit hit and miss. Overall a very good TV.
customer_reviews.author: Informationoverlord

customer_reviews.title: LG Tv 55 inch clarity is good
customer_reviews.text: Amazon service is great with flexibility to payments and quick delivery We researched to product to meet our needs and it connected up to internet , sky box , wii , DVD and has the connections to our stereo receiver to give surround sound. The picture clarity is stunning only down side is the way we have it on the wall means the speaker goes behind our tv stand and not bounce back as i have hearing loss this means we use sports audio setting the most. The flexiibilty of using it with screen share use with amazon , disney+ netflex and apple tv gives us flexibility through the family to see all we have access to
customer_reviews.author: Michelle woolf

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture quality, average sound.
customer_reviews.text: TV picture quality is absolutely amazing, OLED can't be beat. I've never seen better picture quality on anything. The sound, however, isn't as impressive, if you're coming from a TV around the £500 range the sound is pretty similar, not awful, but not great for a TV of this price. So I would recommend getting a good quality soundbar to match the picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Warranty
customer_reviews.text: Disliked when registering for warranty it comes up for only 1 year!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jackson g.

customer_reviews.title: Great picture and UI
customer_reviews.text: Great picture and controls. Had an issue with connecting USBs for recording/pausing so had to use an external HDD
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect picture and sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Perfect picture and sound quality. Quick software response. Nothing to complain overall.
customer_reviews.author: Ciobanu Dragos Irinel

customer_reviews.title: Just out of this world!
customer_reviews.text: Its definitely my flat's main attraction! Amazing quality in sound, picture, design. Of course, if I could have spent a bit less, it would have been even better but otherwise, no complains!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect TV
customer_reviews.text: Awesome picture. Everything else really good. If I had to suggest an improvement I'd want a better quality stand, this one is basic plastic. Does the job but doesn't look that good and not everyone wants their TV wall mounted. But, at the sale price of a tad over £1k, I don't regret buying it for a second!
customer_reviews.author: BrigBarnes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect OLED TV with great Input lag
customer_reviews.text: Usually large TVs in the past had terrible latency and while I know the 2019 version of this has 1ms response time I believe the 10-20 I get with this is worth not spending another thousand pound. Quality wise, this TV is superb. It's really just about the content being 4k HDR at this point.
customer_reviews.author: David Uzumaki

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant TV
customer_reviews.text: Can't comment on the sound because it plays through my AV Amp. Which? Magazine said that 'you can pay a lot more for a TV, but it won't give you a better picture'. I thought my Samsung 49" was good. This one is even better.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: First class viewing
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture and good sound quality. Easy to control with voice or button. Very pleased with it overall. Decent price too, with the option to spread the cost, interest free
customer_reviews.author: Neville

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Believe the hype!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing tv. Feature laden and looks to boot. Nothing comes close at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Jamo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent AV! What you spend here you save on the sound bar you won’t need
customer_reviews.text: The best smart tv I ever had. So worth the cost. By far better than many other TVs with excellent sound. No need to have a sound bar or speakers as the dolby sound is incredible
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Great colour, great tv
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd tv of this model bought. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: mazzy

customer_reviews.title: Remote control is broken after 5 weeks
customer_reviews.text: The remote controller is broken after one month purchase, I contacted the seller, they asked me to contact LG. I feel it is very irresponsible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Volume not good
customer_reviews.text: The TV is great the only fault we have is the sound is very low we have to put it up to 30 or above before we can hear it comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tv
customer_reviews.text: This tv is amazing so easy to setup, talking into the remote instead of painstaking typing things is so much better.. the pictures is so clear it’s like you are watching it in 3D would highly recommend for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ange

customer_reviews.title: doesnt work properly
customer_reviews.text: the alexa part of it wont connect to my alexa device i when i finally got through it kept saying my password was incorrect when i know its not coz ive been signed in & out of my amazon accounts all day to make sure password was right
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Another Level
customer_reviews.text: I had a 5 years old 4K UHD LG tv and wanted a better tv for gaming. I dont think it will get better than this for a while. Perfect TV
customer_reviews.author: Nocrane

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: Really good value for an OLED. Picture quality is excellent. Sound is clear but not the loudest but that is to be expected with internal speakers these days. Dolby picture support is excellent especially with Netflix. Would definitely recommend this TV
customer_reviews.author: BrenC

customer_reviews.title: LG 65inch TV 2019
customer_reviews.text: great tv and picture quality and smart functions are excellent. Definitely worth the money. No need to spend on the 2020 edition from LG if you can get the 2019 version.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture
customer_reviews.text: Love my tv, supplier was great the one I ordered was out of stock so they gave me an upgrade free of charge. Fabulous service
customer_reviews.author: Janet A Nother

customer_reviews.title: Best picture ever
customer_reviews.text: Very good value and excellent picture only negative was sound a little low on certain movies but has not taken away a great tv for the price OLED picture really is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Mark ingram

customer_reviews.title: Awesome BUT..
customer_reviews.text: Great but after 5 months the wifi keeps disconnecting even though everything else in the house is connected.. So I keep having to manually switch the wifi off and back on every half hour or so
customer_reviews.author: MR M T MAYCOCK

customer_reviews.title: Lg OLED B9
customer_reviews.text: There is no option use sound tv's internal speakers at the same time with bluetooth headphones! Otherwise good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Mihai

customer_reviews.title: Good TV
customer_reviews.text: We like this TV but seems price is bit higher
customer_reviews.author: James Saviour

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tv (except for instructions which need a bit of time spent working out how to use all the tv’s facilities). Tv arrived very quickly a d extremely well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be better.
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best TV I've ever seen, stunning. Keith.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to connect to the Internet and add my Prime Account details- up and running in no time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Redmonds

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture. Saw a reviewer say about having to use the volume control all the time, he was right!
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Gough

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: It’s well worth the money the picture is excellent and the sound is good too but even better with my sk9y soundbar
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Powers off after 18 months purchase. 1minute 25 seconds and powers off automatically. Lead Oled technical engineer said it’s a fault in the power board inside the TV. Not impressed. Amazon trying to resolve, this is not looking good!!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing TV, the picture quality & clarity is top class. When watching animated films you get to see the quality of the definition a lot more, also when watching the footy in ultra HD very good! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Greatttttttttt
customer_reviews.text: The best thing ever bought. It’s just unbelievable how good is the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4k UHD TV
customer_reviews.text: Stunning TV. Picture is excellent and dolby atmos sound unreal. Delivered quickly and in perfect condition unlike argos...
customer_reviews.author: craig hogarth

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant tv
customer_reviews.text: 2019 model and on promo however I’m truly amazed by the picture quality. An array of features all easy to use and setup. Sound quality is excellent for a tv.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant TV
customer_reviews.text: Arrived promptly and safely. TV was easy to set up but took sometime to get aquainted with everything available on the TV. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jole

customer_reviews.title: Best value for now
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up quite tricky to operate from the fiddly WiFi remote.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Denton

customer_reviews.title: Quality TV
customer_reviews.text: Excellent TV. As good as some much more expensive ones.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Stunning picture
customer_reviews.text: Great tv with a good interface and fantastic picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Terry S.

customer_reviews.title: Great service Great TV
customer_reviews.text: Love the TV great service at a great price highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Paul.talbot

customer_reviews.title: Incredible picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality picture. Smart functions like Alexa control, google voice control and Netflix with Dolby Vision is a nice touch! Came highly recommended and was not disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: djmcskim

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: A fab TV, great picture, good value too given quality of the picture
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality as great as you would expect
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality as great as you would expect, remote is very easy to use. The software/os is quite simple and straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: swagat

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic TV good tips of colour and quality of visualness.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Miller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for gaming and watching tv. Really easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: piotr buczkowski

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for my previous TV and it was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: PKD

product_meta.title: LG Electronics OLED55B9PLA 55-Inch UHD 4K HDR Smart OLED TV with Freeview Play - Black colour (2019 Model) [Energy Class A] with Alexa built-in
product_meta.description: Step into the wonder of LG OLED. LG B9 combines a cinema screen design with AI brilliance for a TV like no other. Experience films in a new level of immersion using the power of AI to automatically enhance any picture and sound. And with the ability to control Alexa and Google Assistant from your TV, you can truly set the scene at home for your favourite show with a single command. *Apple Airplay available via update mid 2019.
feature_bullets: Organic self emitting pixels achieve the deepest levels of black due to their unique ability to completely switch off - no light is emitted or passing through the pixel
ULTRA HD 4K resolution is four times that of Full HD producing brilliant clarity and vivid details that amaze, even when viewed up close
The 2nd generation α7 Intelligent Processor allows for the premium image quality of OLED TV bringing a clearer and brighter viewing experience and AI processing can enhance any image
LG TV's can recognise major High Dynamic Range formats such as HLG, HDR 10, Dolby Vision and Technicolor, so you get the HDR experience, no matter what HDR entertainment you're enjoying

Find information and control smart home devices by speaking into your LG Magic Remote (purchased separately) or use your Alexa devices (purchased separately) to control your TV with a simple voice command (Alexa available via update mid 2019)"
Alexa built-in devices let you instantly connect to Alexa to play music, control your smart home, get information, news, weather, and more using just your voice.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
